main event: A couple reported seeing an unidentified object hovering at a considerable altitude for 10-15 minutes in Sarasota, Florida in June or July. The object was described as moving very rapidly and making quick maneuvers, leaving the couple greatly frightened and baffled.
interesting points: The couple found the remains of a thin, aluminum-like metallic object approximately 30 inches in diameter in the area where the sighting occurred.
Another witness reported seeing a bright, metallic, shiny object hovering for about 5 minutes before disappearing near Sarasota on March 19th.
A separate report describes an object about 30 feet in diameter with an intense white light that made a sound like steam escaping as it rapidly passed over the witness from south to north.
The sighting was reported to the authorities, but the details provided in the different reports were inconsistent.
The Air Force's Project Blue Book program requested additional details about the Sarasota sighting to include in their evaluation.
sighted object: Unidentified flying object, metallic object remains
